_comment: Note: gosec config file support appears broken. Exclusions are applied via -exclude flag in .github/workflows/security.yml

_exclusion_reasons.G104: Unchecked errors in non-critical paths (UI formatting, etc.)
_exclusion_reasons.G107: Dynamic URLs required for API client configuration
_exclusion_reasons.G204: Command execution needed for editor integration
_exclusion_reasons.G301: Intentional directory permissions for config directories
_exclusion_reasons.G304: File path operations required for YAML entity management
_exclusion_reasons.G306: Shell completion scripts require 0644, entity files use 0600
